Class EngineTableModel

java.lang.Object
javax.swing.table.AbstractTableModel
EngineTableModel
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, TableModel
public class EngineTableModel extends AbstractTableModel
The EngineTableModel class serves as a data model for displaying engine information in a JTable within a Swing application. It extends the AbstractTableModel to provide the necessary functionality for managing and displaying a list of Engine objects.
See Also:

      public int getRowCount()
      Returns the number of rows in the model, which corresponds to the number of engines.
      Returns:

    • getColumnCount

      public int getColumnCount()
      Returns the number of columns in the model.
      Returns:
      the number of columns, which is fixed at 2 (Engine Type, Horsepower).
